Package fr.gouv.vitam.access.external.client

Class AdminExternalClientFactory

java.lang.Object
fr.gouv.vitam.common.external.client.VitamClientFactory<AdminExternalClient>
fr.gouv.vitam.access.external.client.AdminExternalClientFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
VitamClientFactoryInterface<AdminExternalClient>
public class AdminExternalClientFactory extends VitamClientFactory<AdminExternalClient>
Admin External Client Factory
Used to create admin external client : if configuration file does not exist 'access-external-client.conf',
mock access client will be returned
